 27namespace vsip_csl
 28{
 29namespace dispatcher
 30{
 31namespace op
 32{
 33// Evaluator OpTag for value reductions.
 34template <template <typename> class ReduceT> struct reduce;
 35// Evaluator OpTag for reductions returning index.
 36template <template <typename> class ReduceT> struct reduce_idx;
 37} // namespace vsip_csl::dispatcher::op
 38} // namespace vsip_csl::dispatcher

 46/***********************************************************************
 47  Reduction Functors
 48***********************************************************************/
 49
 50
 51template <typename T>
 52struct All_true
 53{
 54  static reduction_type const rtype = reduce_all_true;
 55
 56  typedef T result_type;
 57  typedef T accum_type;
 58
 59  static accum_type initial() { return ~(accum_type()); }
 60
 61  static accum_type update(accum_type state, T new_value)
 62    { return band(state, new_value); }
 63
 64  static accum_type value(accum_type state, length_type)
 65    { return state; }
 66
 67  static bool done(accum_type state) { return (state == T()); }
 68};
 69
 70
 71template <>
 72struct All_true<bool>
 73{
 74  static reduction_type const rtype = reduce_all_true_bool;
 75
 76  typedef bool result_type;
 77  typedef bool accum_type;
 78
 79  static bool initial() { return true; }
 80
 81  static bool update(bool state, bool new_value)
 82    { return land(state, new_value); }
 83
 84  static bool value(bool state, length_type)
 85    { return state; }
 86
 87  static bool done(bool state) { return state == false; }
 88};
 89
 90
 91
 92template <typename T>
 93struct Any_true
 94{
 95  static reduction_type const rtype = reduce_any_true;
 96
 97  typedef T result_type;
 98  typedef T accum_type;
 99
100  static accum_type initial() { return accum_type(); }
101
102  static accum_type update(accum_type state, T new_value)
103    { return bor(state, new_value); }
104
105  static accum_type value(accum_type state, length_type)
106    { return state; }
107
108  static bool done(accum_type state) { return (state == ~(T())); }
109};
110
111
112template <>
113struct Any_true<bool>
114{
115  static reduction_type const rtype = reduce_any_true_bool;
116
117  typedef bool result_type;
118  typedef bool accum_type;
119
120  static bool initial() { return false; }
121
122  static bool update(bool state, bool new_value)
123    { return lor(state, new_value); }
124
125  static bool value(bool state, length_type)
126    { return state; }
127
128  static bool done(bool state) { return state == true; }
129};
130
131
132template <typename T, typename R = T>
133struct Mean_value_base
134{
135  static reduction_type const rtype = reduce_sum;
136
137  typedef R result_type;
138  typedef R accum_type;
139
140  static accum_type initial() { return accum_type(); }
141
142  static accum_type update(accum_type state, T new_value)
143    { return state + new_value; }
144
145  static accum_type value(accum_type state, length_type size)
146    { return state / static_cast<accum_type>(size); }
147
148  static bool done(accum_type) { return false; }
149};
150
151template <typename T>
152struct Mean_value : public Mean_value_base<T> {};
153
154template <typename R>
155struct Mean_value_helper
156{
157  template <typename T>
158  struct Mean_value : public Mean_value_base<T,R> {};
159};
160
161
162template <typename T, typename R = typename Scalar_of<T>::type>
163struct Mean_magsq_value_base
164{
165  static reduction_type const rtype = reduce_sum;
166
167  typedef R result_type;
168  typedef R accum_type;
169
170  static accum_type initial() { return accum_type(); }
171
172  static accum_type update(accum_type state, T new_value)
173    { return state + vsip::impl::fn::magsq(new_value, R()); }
174
175  static accum_type value(accum_type state, length_type size)
176    { return state / size; }
177
178  static bool done(accum_type) { return false; }
179};
180
181template <typename T>
182struct Mean_magsq_value : public Mean_magsq_value_base<T> {};
183
184template <typename R>
185struct Mean_magsq_value_helper
186{
187  template <typename T>
188  struct Mean_magsq_value : public Mean_magsq_value_base<T,R> {};
189};
190
191// Generic base class for summing items of type T into
192// an accumulator of type R.
193
194template <typename T, typename R = T>
195struct Sum_value_base
196{
197  static reduction_type const rtype = reduce_sum;
198
199  typedef R result_type;
200  typedef R accum_type;
201
202  static accum_type initial() { return accum_type(); }
203
204  static accum_type update(accum_type state, T new_value)
205    { return state + new_value; }
206
207  static accum_type value(accum_type state, length_type)
208    { return state; }
209
210  static bool done(accum_type) { return false; }
211};
212
213// Use this with reduce<> when T and R are identical.
214// eg:
215//   reduce<impl::Sum_value>
216
217template <typename T>
218struct Sum_value : public Sum_value_base<T> {};
219
220// Use this with reduce<> when T and R are different.
221// eg:
222//   reduce<impl::Sum_value_helper<R>::template Sum_value>
223
224template <typename R>
225struct Sum_value_helper
226{
227  template <typename T>
228  struct Sum_value : public Sum_value_base<T,R> {};
229};
230
231
232
233template <typename T>
234struct Sum_magsq_value
235{
236  static reduction_type const rtype = reduce_sum;
237
238  typedef typename Scalar_of<T>::type result_type;
239  typedef typename Scalar_of<T>::type accum_type;
240
241  static accum_type initial() { return accum_type(); }
242
243  static accum_type update(accum_type state, T new_value)
244    { return state + magsq(new_value); }
245
246  static accum_type value(accum_type state, length_type)
247    { return state; }
248
249  static bool done(accum_type) { return false; }
250};
251
252
253
254/// Specialization for 'bool': return the number of true values.
255
256template <>
257struct Sum_value<bool>
258{
259  static reduction_type const rtype = reduce_sum;
260
261  typedef length_type result_type;
262  typedef length_type accum_type;
263
264  static accum_type initial() { return accum_type(); }
265
266  static accum_type update(accum_type state, bool new_value)
267    { return state + (new_value ? 1 : 0); }
268
269  static accum_type value(accum_type state, length_type)
270    { return state; }
271
272  static bool done(accum_type) { return false; }
273};
274
275
276
277template <typename T, typename R = T>
278struct Sum_sq_value_base
279{
280  static reduction_type const rtype = reduce_sum;
281
282  typedef R result_type;
283  typedef R accum_type;
284
285  static accum_type initial() { return accum_type(); }
286
287  static accum_type update(accum_type state, T new_value)
288    { return state + new_value * new_value; }
289
290  static accum_type value(accum_type state, length_type)
291    { return state; }
292
293  static bool done(accum_type) { return false; }
294};
295
296template <typename T>
297struct Sum_sq_value : public Sum_sq_value_base<T> {};
298
299// Use this with reduce<> when T and R are different.
300// eg:
301//   reduce<impl::Sum_value_helper<R>::template Sum_value>
302
303template <typename R>
304struct Sum_sq_value_helper
305{
306  template <typename T>
307  struct Sum_sq_value : public Sum_sq_value_base<T,R> {};
308};
309
310
311/***********************************************************************
312  Reduction-Index Functors
313***********************************************************************/
314
315template <typename T>
316class Max_value
317{
318public:
319  typedef T result_type;
320
321  Max_value(T init) : value_(init) {}
322
323  bool next_value(T value)
324  {
325    if (value > value_)
326    {
327      value_ = value;
328      return true;
329    }
330    else return false;
331  }
332
333  T value() { return value_; }
334
335private:
336  T value_;
337};
338
339
340
341template <typename T>
342class Min_value
343{
344public:
345  typedef T result_type;
346
347  Min_value(T init) : value_(init) {}
348
349  bool next_value(T value)
350  {
351    if (value < value_)
352    {
353      value_ = value;
354      return true;
355    }
356    else return false;
357  }
358
359  T value() { return value_; }
360
361private:
362  T value_;
363};
364
365
366
367template <typename T>
368class Max_mag_value
369{
370public:
371  typedef typename Scalar_of<T>::type result_type;
372
373  Max_mag_value(T init) : value_(mag(init)) {}
374
375  bool next_value(T value)
376  {
377    result_type tmp = mag(value);
378    if (tmp > value_)
379    {
380      value_ = tmp;
381      return true;
382    }
383    else return false;
384  }
385
386  result_type value() { return value_; }
387
388private:
389  result_type value_;
390};
391
392
393
394template <typename T>
395class Min_mag_value
396{
397public:
398  typedef typename Scalar_of<T>::type result_type;
399
400  Min_mag_value(T init) : value_(mag(init)) {}
401
402  bool next_value(T value)
403  {
404    result_type tmp = mag(value);
405    if (tmp < value_)
406    {
407      value_ = tmp;
408      return true;
409    }
410    else return false;
411  }
412
413  result_type value() { return value_; }
414
415private:
416  result_type value_;
417};
418
419
420
421template <typename T>
422class Max_magsq_value
423{
424public:
425  typedef typename Scalar_of<T>::type result_type;
426
427  Max_magsq_value(T init) : value_(magsq(init)) {}
428
429  bool next_value(T value)
430  {
431    result_type tmp = magsq(value);
432    if (tmp > value_)
433    {
434      value_ = tmp;
435      return true;
436    }
437    else return false;
438  }
439
440  result_type value() { return value_; }
441
442private:
443  result_type value_;
444};
445
446
447
448template <typename T>
449class Min_magsq_value
450{
451public:
452  typedef typename Scalar_of<T>::type result_type;
453
454  Min_magsq_value(T init) : value_(magsq(init)) {}
455
456  bool next_value(T value)
457  {
458    result_type tmp = magsq(value);
459    if (tmp < value_)
460    {
461      value_ = tmp;
462      return true;
463    }
464    else return false;
465  }
466
467  result_type value() { return value_; }
468
469private:
470  result_type value_;
471};
